review.body:
``/^https:\/\/check-host\.net\/images\/ondguard+(_|[0-9]?[a-z-])+(s?ale|en|ru)?\.png\?[0-9]/$domain=check-host.net``

Feel free to improve this rule if you want.

pull_request.title: Fix #165624 check-host.net

comment.body:
I can no longer access the bing search, I can't find a reason. Google works though. 

I encountered these issues while talking in discord with someone, I even shared my screen, so I was definitely connected to the internet.
